title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com> wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in the property sheet. The expected behavior is for the combo box to always match the width of the property sheet column. However, currently it does not. It should function in the same way as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible. It needs further investigation to determine whether the issue lies with our code or with SWT.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not resize correctly in the property sheet. It should always match the width of the property sheet column. Currently, it does not work as expected and needs to be fixed to have the same behavior as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible.
SR:
1. Investigate the cause of the ComboBoxCellEditor not resizing correctly in the property sheet.
2. Determine whether the issue is with our code or SWT.
3. Fix the resizing issue and ensure the ComboBoxCellEditor matches the width of the property sheet column.
4. Ensure the ComboBoxCellEditor functions in the same way as the DialogCellEditor, with the button always visible.
